hero.title: Experience the flavors of Italy
hero.subtitle: From our family recipes passed down through generations, we bring you authentic Italian dishes made with the finest ingredients. Join us for an unforgettable dining experience.
hero.imageAlt: Elegant Italian restaurant interior with warm lighting and beautiful table settings

about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2008 by Chef Marco Rossi, Bella Vista brings authentic Italian cuisine to the heart of the city. Our recipes have been passed down through three generations, originating from a small trattoria in Tuscany. Every dish is prepared with the same passion and attention to detail that has made Italian cuisine world-renowned.
about.subtitle: What makes us special

chef.name: Chef Marco Rossi
chef.title: Executive Chef & Owner
chef.bio: Born in Florence, Chef Marco brings 20+ years of culinary expertise to Bella Vista. Trained in traditional Italian techniques, he ensures every dish meets the highest standards of authenticity.
chef.imageAlt: Chef Marco Rossi in the kitchen

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from our valued customers

items.text: Absolutely incredible! The carbonara is exactly like what I had in Rome. Chef Marco's attention to detail is remarkable.
items.author: Sarah Mitchell

items.text: We've been coming here for our anniversary dinner for 5 years. The osso buco is phenomenal and the wine selection is perfect.
items.author: Michael & Elena Rodriguez

items.text: The atmosphere is magical and the food transports you to Italy. The tiramisu is the best I've ever had outside of Tuscany!
items.author: Jennifer Walsh

items.text: Perfect for date night! The service is impeccable and every dish is a work of art. Highly recommend the tasting menu.
items.author: David Chen

items.question: Do you take reservations?
items.answer: Yes, we highly recommend reservations especially for weekends and holidays. You can book online through our website or call us at (555) 123-4567.

items.question: Do you accommodate dietary restrictions?
items.answer: Absolutely! We can modify most dishes for gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan diets. Please inform your server of any allergies or dietary needs.

items.question: Is there parking available?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary valet parking Tuesday-Saturday evenings. There's also street parking and a public garage one block away.

items.question: Do you host private events?
items.answer: Yes! Our private dining room accommodates up to 20 guests with custom menus available. Contact us at least 2 weeks in advance to plan your event.

items.question: What are your hours?
items.answer: We're closed Mondays. Tuesday-Thursday 5PM-10PM, Friday-Saturday 5PM-11PM, Sunday 4PM-9PM. Kitchen closes 30 minutes before restaurant.

items.question: Do you offer takeout or delivery?
items.answer: Yes, we offer takeout for most menu items. Call ahead to place your order. For delivery, we partner with major delivery services.

items.question: What is your wine selection like?
items.answer: We have an award-winning wine list featuring over 100 Italian wines, from Tuscany to Sicily. Our sommelier is happy to help with pairings.

items.question: Is the restaurant family-friendly?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome families and have a children's menu available. We recommend earlier dining times (before 7PM) for families with young children.
